content:
Click the 3-bar menu icon in the upper right, New Account, Email, enter your credentials, then click Manual config. and enter these settings:

incoming POP server: mail.zianet.com, port 110, security = none, authentication = password, transmitted insecurely, User Name = part of address before @

outgoing SMTP server: mail.zianet.com, port 587, security = none, authentication = password, transmitted insecurely, User Name = part of address before @

https://w3.zianet.com/mozilla-thunderbird-e-mail-setup.html
creator: sfhowes

content: Pls read Add the Search bar to your Firefox toolbar

content: Spustite Thunderbird v "Núdzovom režime" a preverte či chyba pretrváva (držte klávesu SHIFT pri spustení Thunderbirdu). Na spustenie programu do núdzového režimu môžete použiť odkazy v ponuke Štart-Spustiť (alebo Win+R): https://support.mozilla.org/cs/kb/nouzovy-rezim-thunderbirdu http://imgbank.cz/images/2016/06/02/Thunderbird_nudzovy_rezim.jpg
creator: Ansamb

content:
amateliercz napsal(a)
Nepřichází pošta

Nabízí se možnost, že ti prostě nikdo nepíše. Jinak informace, které jsi dodal jsou k ničemu. Předpokládám, že na webu poskytovatele e-mailu ve schránce ty zprávy jsou?

Zkus odkaz: Nemohu přijímat zprávy
creator: poljos-moz

content:
1. Over half of your space usage is in the "All Mail" folder, whose messages don't actually get deleted unless you manually go into that folder and delete them. (I find that deleting them using gmail web is most effective)

2. You don't need to be subscribed to the "All Mail" folder in Thunderbird, which will save you considerable disk space.

3. On the off chance that you have lingering files from old compacts, look for files with nstmp in the file name.
creator: wsmwk

content:
Thanks for reply Wayne.

1/. Don't quite understande what your saying re "All Mail" folder. I assumed this was basically the "Inbox" folder, and that if I deleted all the mails in the "All Mail" folder they would disappear from Inbox also?

2/. Also don't understand what you mean by 'subscribed' to All Mail folder - so far as I remember this was the default folder setup when first installed TB

content: Krijgt u een foutmelding? Kunt u een schermafdruk toevoegen (ontdaan van privéinformatie)? Heeft de bijlage een bepaalde extensie die uw systeem niet herkent, zie ook: https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/bijlagen-gebruiken.
